EmailTemplate.subject: Your vote makes a difference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
THANK YOU for making VinSolutions a THREE TIME Automotive Website Award winner!
2011 Best Integrated Dealership Website 2011 Pinnacle Platform – Search Marketing 2010 Best Integrated Dealership Website 2010 Pinnacle Platform – Search Marketing 2009 Pinnacle Platform – Search Marketing
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
VinSolutions has AGAIN been nominated to be recognized with an AWA! In order to add even MORE value to the results, PCG Digital Marketing, the automotive consulting firm behind the peer-reviewed awards, has asked that our valued dealers provide some feedback: http://bit.ly/Vin4AWA
The 2012 awards program has been expanded to include more product and platform categories, more comprehensive scoring metrics, and greater distribution of results by offering the final review guide book as a free digital download on iTunes, Google Play, and Amazon. Be sure to sign-up for yours while you provide insight into the VIN products that help give your dealership the competitive advantage: http://bit.ly/Vin4AWA
Winners will be announced on September 6th at AutoCon2012 in Las Vegas. Take advantage of the VinSolutions Valued Customer Discount by registering to join us here: http://bit.ly/Nn0eLg. Add the coupon code “VIP” for an additional $100 off!
Thank you for your commitment to helping us continue to innovate the products that help you to find, sell and keep customers more profitable. Thank you be(ing)one with VIN!
